ygData.subject: Chaos for Kslawdogg
ygData.msgSnippet: The echoing thud of metal on metal could be heard over the valley, as Firedrill continued to smash his fists against the IGL s ship. LET ME IN, YOU TURBINE

Subject: Chaos for Kslawdogg

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

The echoing thud of metal on metal could be heard over the valley, as
Firedrill continued to smash his fists against the IGL's ship. "LET ME
IN, YOU TURBINE SWILLIN GASKET BREATHED POWER WEASELS." his voice echoed
past Redhot. Unfortunately he was only accomplashing one thing, tirring
himself out.
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Meanwhile on the other side of the huge ship, two small red slits of
fury watched as Sinew let loose a burst of electrical energy, then the
eyes leapt out of the way with the rest of its body, as Grimlock moved
to the side, as the static wave scorched the earth. Grimlock landed with
a loud thud, and drew his energo sword. "Me not like your face."

----------------------------------------------------------------------

"So when do they let us in, we've been sitting here for hours now and
youve said nothing brother."

Nightmare watched his Hyena brother pace back and forth, and continue
complaining as he had done for the last two hours. He sat and watched
the large metalic door and waited. 

"I mean, we are champions, and they want champions don't they?" The
hideous voice continued. He then transformed, leaping into the air, and
landing upright in his bipedal mode, aiming his sawed off ripler shot
gun at the door. "Why don't we just make our own ent..." he was cut off
by a loud grunt from the dark horse, as Nightmare's wings unfolded from
his body. He began to whisper in the same voice, which sounded like and
echo at the bottom of a pit. 

"Listen carefully brother." and they both sat in silence for a minute.
The sound of clanging against metal and cursing begining to fill theyre
audio senses.
